english.segment1: Hear the holy roar of God resound. Watch the waters part before us now. Come and see what He has done for us. Tell the world of His great love,
english.segment2: Our God is the God who saves. Our God is the God who saves
english.segment3: Let God arise. Let God arise. Our God reigns now and forever. He reigns now and forever
english.segment4: His enemies will run for sure. And the church will stand, she will endure. He holds the keys of life, our Lord. Death has no strength, no final word
english.segment5: Our God is the God who saves. Our God is the God who saves
english.segment6: Let God arise. Let God arise. Our God reigns now and forever. He reigns now and forever
english.segment7: Let God arise. Let God arise. Our God reigns now and forever. He reigns now and forever
english.segment8: Our God is a God who saves. Our God is a God who saves. Our God is a God who saves. Our God is a God who saves
english.segment9: Let God arise. Let God arise. Our God reigns now and forever. He reigns now and forever
english.segment10: Let God arise. Let God arise. Our God reigns now and forever. He reigns now and forever
